attributes.action: Allow zoos to Re-open with social distancing and other measures in place.
attributes.additional_details: The government have said that outdoor spaces can be re-opened the zoo's are fully compliant with social distancing but then the law was changed and zoos can't open. But national trust parks and theme parks can. Zoos can't just stop feeding their animals, or paying insurances.
attributes.background: Allow zoos that have social distancing measures in place to Re-open in July.
